name: OrangeMan
description:
Based on the suggestion "hillariously buggy bullethell about confused politicans" of "gameideamachine" on Twitter we developed a small game about the current president of the USA.

He has to fight of "Fake News Reporters", North Koreans and Mexicans by tweeting them but is powerless against "Obama Care Supporters" which he has to avoid. Tweeting enemies results in them dying and increasing his ragebar. Everytime the ragebar is filled he gets an orange which he can eat to activate his rage-mode, becoming invincible and increasing his tweetrate.
When he grabs the.... cats that spawn every now and then he regenerates life and thus is able to tweet more.

This game was part of a gamejam at our school and both developers are educated to become game artists.

A devlog can be found here: https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?pid=47522#p47522
